name: redmine-markdown-editor-crx
description: Chrome extension that adds a Markdown editor overlay to Redmine textareas

scripts.update:css-patche: npm install @uiw/react-markdown-preview --force && cp patches/markdown-fix.css node_modules/@uiw/react-markdown-preview/esm/styles/markdown.css && rm -f patches/@uiw+react-markdown-preview+*.patch && npx patch-package @uiw/react-markdown-preview
scripts.update:editor-patche: npm install @uiw/react-markdown-editor --force && cp patches/fullscreen-fix.tsx node_modules/@uiw/react-markdown-editor/src/commands/fullscreen.tsx && rm -f patches/@uiw+react-markdown-editor+*.patch && npx patch-package @uiw/react-markdown-editor
